name: part_004
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】Attention Please!! Special Tea Party with Pavolia Reine!!! #PavoliaReine3D [aBgFX_2oIU4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Pavolia Reine gives a tour of her 3D room, showing her bookshelves and dusting her PC desk.
Reine takes a break on her bed after cleaning and prepares to summon guests.
Reine summons a swarm of 'Tatang' mascots and plays with them before tidying up.
The scene transitions to a rooftop at night. Takanashi Kiara joins Reine for a song performance.
